item.description:
M.L.K Weekend 2010


New Britain,CT - Sat. Jan 16th.

Trump Tight Ent. & Jason V. Watts
presents

"Jokes & Notes "

Trinity on Main Theatre
69 Main St. New Britain,CT 06051
(Free Parking)

A BRAND NEW Live Band & Comedy Experience like no other. Matthew Kearney host of the Longest Running Urban Comedy Show in CT "It's Just Comedy" & Jason V. Watts (BlackinCT.com, The Urban Professionals Network) have teamed up to bring you a unique mix of Comedy and Live Jazz, Soul, & R&B.
This month's special guest are Gerald Kelly, John Moses,& Devian Velez. These comedians have graced the stage of Caroline's Comedy Club, Comic View, Comedy Central, The Laugh Factory, and more!

Special Guest Bands

Serious Bizness - Greater Hartford
"Beans & Greens" - Eastern Connecticut

Doors and VIP Seating 8pm
Show Starts 9pm
$10 in Advance $15 at the Door

Visit BlackinCT.com to buy tickets online, and information on this months acts. For Birthdays, VIP, info, or group rates call 860.356.5451 (ALL MEETUP MEMBERS CALL 860 356 5451 for 2 for 1 ticket special - limited quantities available)
item.name: Live Comedy & Jazz Showcase - New Britain,CT - MLK Weekend 2010
